name: Lewis Clement
bio: After many years of writing hobby projects in C++ and school- and professional project in C# and JavaScript, my new go-to language has become Rust. As a perfect blend of a low-level language with high-level syntax features it's become the language I get most joy using, and hopefully I help others find enjoyment in it too.

name: Eduardo Diaz
bio: I have more than 32 (1<<5) years programming, in C & C++ in my first years, later on Java, C# and Scala. My new passion is Rust. I love the blend between system programming and the functional paradigm. Also if you speak spanish, I'm here to help!. (Si hablas espaÃ±ol te puedo ayudar ;)
